A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was filmed beautifully but the story was weak. I was incredibly disappointed with the direction they took Luck's character. He was a hero that would risk everything to save is father to a.... Well I'm not even sure how to describe what they turned him into. Star Wars was such a big part of my childhood it just breaks my heart to see what they are doing to it. I wonder if RJ has ever watched A New Hope\, The Empire Strikes Back\, or Return of the Jedi?
